TopicTitle: STS Hubble Space Telescope by xoknight

Articles.Content:
Here is my latest STS mission, delivering the STS Hubble Space Telescope for my Mission Specialist IV mission:

1st attempt:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KysKu2J0EiA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

2nd attempt:

A mission to deploy the HST developed by xoknight. This mission also was run to test the new KMU MMU developed by Rune which unfortunately nearly goes all HAL on him. Inigma unintentionally demonstrates the water landing emergency procedure for the STS-4 Space Shuttle. Earn your Astronaut badge today. Check out: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112399-STS-Space-Shuttle-Challenges-PROVE-YOUR-PILOTING-METTLE-Earn-a-Badge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112399-STS-Space-Shuttle-Challenges-PROVE-YOUR-PILOTING-METTLE-Earn-a-Badge)!
